song_lyric:
作曲 : 天府音乐
 作词 : 天府音乐
Y'all guess who we are
This is China
We are the young force of the people's republicc
Revolution baby
Now let me introduce an eastern civilization
The most ancient remotest legend
And the dragon is the PRC
Y'all know my name
The nation never died
Cuz we tied the bonds
中华心相连
And right now we try to recover
Now we are on the road
It's close
What's more we're getting better
30 year of reform and opening policy is
Why we stand on the world stage like this
We are paving the belt and road again
Like it used to be
About a hundred countries have joined in AIIB
Konw what it is
A fresh new world
With peace and love
We try to make some fresh new rules
For all those people
Who had fought and sacrificed their lives
And here we say gracias
No pain no gain
We understand
This is the time for us to shine
This is China
Now y'all listen to my announcing
报上名来
This is China
We love the country
We are the chi phenomena
中华儿女民族自豪
少年当自强
发光发亮
听年轻人的主张
报上名来
This is China
We love the country
We are the chi phenomena
中华儿女民族自豪
少年当自强
发光发亮
听年轻人的主张
我在80 年代出生
太多问题想问
我以为我的父辈从未经历那些困顿
从此我开始新的生活
也开始见证
科技的发展普及发散
Make the change
所以我现在可以
不管在哪里
无延迟地告诉你
我爱你我想你
我很开心听到的声音
也都如此温馨
我们用爱以和为贵
自信改变世界
我终于走上了越来越大的舞台
我告诉爸爸妈妈
接下来的事情我来
我要感谢所有拒绝我的每个平台
让你们知道
让你们听到
让你们看到我有多帅
如果你跌倒就站起来
如果曾失败就重新来
荣耀的使命
热血且理性
让冬奥会的圣火燃烧在北京
